snippet: The Braves traded the right-hander Tommy Hanson to the Los Angeles Angels for the reliever Jordan Walden.
abstract: Atlanta Braves trade starting pitcher Tommy Hanson to Los Angeles Angels for relief pitcher Jordan Walden; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Braves traded the right-hander Tommy Hanson to the Los Angeles Angels for the reliever Jordan Walden.

headline.seo: Braves Trade Tommy Hanson to Angels
